attributes.action: MAKE IT A CRIMINAL OFFENCE FOR PUBLIC SERVANTS TO `TAKE MONEY OUT OF THE PUBLIC PURSE`
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT A LAW WHERE IT IS AN `OFFENCE` FOR ANY PUBLIC SERVANT TO `DIP` THEIR HANDS INTO THE `PUBLIC PURSE`, IT DOES NOT MAKE SENSE IN THIS DAY AND AGE WITH THE COUNTRY LACKING MONEY YET PUBLIC BODIES HELP THEM SELVES TO THOUSANDS OF POUNDS WHILE OTHERS ARE STRUGGLING TO SURVIVE, THIS SHOULD BE COMMON SENSE AND CLASSED AS `FRAUD` AS IN OTHER WALKS OF LIFE, NOBODY SHOULD HAVE THE RIGHT TO FEATHER THEIR OWN NEST AT THE COST OF OTHERS.

LAW CHANGE AND ENFORCEMENT PLEASE.
